content.rendered: New moms are always sharing helpful tips about breastfeeding and babies, but what if we told you that some of the generally circulated info is wrong? We talked to our lactation consultants to dispel the top 5 breastfeeding myths to help new moms keep their breastfeeding journeys on track.

excerpt.rendered: New moms are always sharing helpful tips about breastfeeding and babies, but what if we told you that some of the generally circulated info is wrong?
